definitions: Identifies someone or something from having encountered them before; knows again.
Acknowledges the existence, validity, or legality of something.
Shows appreciation for an achievement or service.
Grants official accreditation to; formally approves.
examples: She recognizes her old friend despite the years.
The government recognizes the new state.
The company recognizes employees for their hard work.
The university recognizes the new degree program.
He recognizes the importance of education.
